page.title: 16ARMED FORCES * LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
{ARMED FORCES} The Army and Bomb Disposal Units use the Downs for training exercises. Beddingham chalk pit is used by the Army and the police for training.
{LAW AND ORDER There have not been a lot of big offences in our area. There have been some burglaries and stealing but no more than petty stealing.There are only passing policemen that go through the village, there are no policemen that do daily beat duty. The village policeman comes from Ringmer so he is not often in Firle.
